author: iocanel
msg: [KARAF-1081] Added a merge policy for cellar. The merge policy will merge string (comma separated & specially tagged), sets, list and multinode entries. [from revision 1209964]

author: iocanel
msg: [KARAF-1026] Fixed the dosgi itest to test 1 and 2 service nodes and also assert loadbalancing is correct.

author: iocanel
msg: [KARAF-1081] Refactored Group to implement MultiNode interface used by the merge policy.
